meta.title: React2Shell Scanner - CVE-2025-55182 & CVE-2025-66478 Detector
meta.description: Detect critical RCE vulnerabilities in Next.js applications

about.title: About the Vulnerabilities
about.description1: CVE-2025-55182 & CVE-2025-66478 are critical Remote Code Execution (RCE) vulnerabilities in Next.js applications using React Server Components (RSC).
about.description2: The scanner sends a crafted multipart POST request that exploits the serialization mechanism. Vulnerable servers execute a harmless mathematical operation (41*271=11111) and return the result in the response header.
about.warning: This tool is for authorized security testing only. Always obtain proper authorization before scanning any systems.

footer.credit: Based on research from Assetnote Security Research Team
